meanings.definition: A type of lemur native to Madagascar.
meanings.sent1: The indris in the zoo were jumping from tree to tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of indris while exploring the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The indris decided to have a dance party in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The indris moved gracefully through the forest like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The indris' haunting calls echoed through the trees.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'indri'.
meanings.sent1: Many indris gathered near the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the indris in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The indris threw a surprise birthday party for their friend.
meanings.sent4: The indris stood out in the crowd like colorful gems.
meanings.sent5: The indris' playful antics entertained the onlookers.
